de.hadizadeh.positioning.roommodel.android

Class MapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fragment
      • de.hadizadeh.positioning.roommodel.android.MapFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TouchView.OnTouchViewChangeListener

    public class MapFragment
extends Fragment
implements TouchView.OnTouchViewChangeListener
    Handles every fragment which has a room model map inside
